title: Lauriol Plaza
snippet:
1835 18th St NW, Washington, DC 20009
R&J's favorite big box mexican food. Come for the swirl margharita, stay for the guac.

title: Ben's Chili Bowl
snippet:
1213 U St NW, Washington, DC
Classic DC fair, get the half smoke. Stay for the people watching.
